additional-resources.title: Additional Resources for Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics
additional-resources.description: This page provides additional resources to supplement your learning in Physical AI and Humanoid Robotics.

glossary.title: Glossary of Robotics and AI Terms
glossary.description: This glossary provides definitions for key terms used throughout the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics textbook.

hardware-requirements.title: Hardware Requirements
hardware-requirements.description: This section outlines the computational and hardware requirements for engaging with the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics textbook. The demands vary based on the complexity of simulations, visual perception tasks, and the integration of generative AI models.

introduction/why-physical-ai-matters.title: Why Physical AI Matters
introduction/why-physical-ai-matters.description: Physical AI represents a paradigm shift from purely digital intelligence to embodied intelligence, where AI systems interact with the real world through physical bodies, such as humanoid robots.

prerequisites-setup.title: Prerequisites and Development Environment Setup
prerequisites-setup.description: To ensure a smooth learning and development experience with the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics textbook, it is essential to set up your development environment correctly. This section outlines the necessary prerequisites and provides guidance on configuring your system.
